attributes.action: have the one off payment for an MP standing down means tested
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that the payment, meant to allow the ex mp to readjust to life outside parliament and to keep him going until he gets a job should be means tested. If the ex mp earns more than £30k in the year after standing down, the payment should be returned.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
